term.title: wavenumber

item.text: The reciprocal of the wavelength, λ, or the number of waves per unit length along the direction of propagation. The SI unit is m-1, but a commonly used unit is cm-1. Symbols ν ˜ in a vacuum, σ in a medium.

sources.item: PAC, 1985, 57, 105. 'Names, symbols, definitions and units of quantities in optical spectroscopy (Recommendations 1984)' on page 109 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198557010105)
